card.name: Contested Powers of Mirkwood
card.text: Quest. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company; any player may bring Contested Powers of Mirkwood into play from their sideboard. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Tap a unique faction you have in play at a site in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions to take one Clean the Greenwood, Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, Towers Destroyed, or a Stolen Knowledge resource from your sideboard to your hand; then flip this card.

card.name: Contested Powers of Mirkwood
card.text: Quest. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company; any player may bring Contested Powers of Mirkwood into play from their sideboard. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Tap a unique faction you have in play at a site in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions to take one Smoke on the Wind, Burning Rick, Cot, and Tree, or a Stolen Knowledge resource from your sideboard to your hand; then flip this card.

card.name: Dark Spires Rising
card.text: Your Barad-dur does not leave active play. During the site phase at Barad-dur, tap three characters with each a different skill and play Hold Rebuilt and Repaired (as if at a Ruins & Lairs [R]) to invert this card. Only one copy of this card can be inverted. If inverted, it gives 3 mp and Mordor in Ruins cannot be played (remove from the game if in play). You may replace The Necromacer with Sauron or The Lidless Eye, which may be taken from your sideboard or hand. Flip this card if Barad-dur is not a Dark-hold [D] or Shadow-hold [S].

card.name: Dragon Marked in Red
card.text: Quest. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company. Any player may bring Dragon Marked in Red into play from his sideboard. Flip this card when you play a unique item at a site in Withered Heath or its adjacent regions. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Dragon Marked in Red
card.text: Quest. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company. Any player may bring Dragon Marked in Red into play from his sideboard. Flip this card when you play a unique item at a site in Withered Heath or its adjacent regions. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Foundations Remain
card.text: Quest. Black player only. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company. Bring Mordor in Ruins into play from your sideboard (if possible); other players may bring Foundations Remain or Spies into Mordor into play from their sideboard. During the site phase at Barad-dur, tap three characters with each a different skill and play Hold Rebuilt and Repaired (as if at a Ruins & Lairs [R]) to flip this card. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Gold beyond Price and Count
card.text: Whenever you defeat a Dragon attack, rotate this card 90° and rotate any Use with Terrible Effect in play back 90°. For each time rotated, Dragon attacks against your companies receive -1 to their prowess. This card gives 2 mp if fully rotated.

card.name: Land of the Necromancer
card.text: Attacks against hero companies keyed to a region or site in Mirkwood receive +1 prowess and strikes for every two unique minion factions in play at such sites. When this card is inverted, it gives 3 mp and any Wholesome Forest in re-inverted. Flip this card when it is re-inverted. Warlord or Sauron only: place any Smoke on the Wind or Burning Rick, Cot, and Tree successfully played at a site in Mirkwood or its adjacent regions with this card. If there are two or more such cards placed with it, invert this card when another is placed with it.

card.name: Mordor Rebuilt
card.text: All automatic-attacks at sites in Gorgoroth, Imlad Morgul, Nurn, and Udun receive +1 to their prowess and strikes. Any site in these regions on which Tower Raided is played does not leave active play. During the site phase at such a site, minion characters with a combined prowess of 15 or more may tap to discard Tower Raided from the hero version.

card.name: Overlord of Minas Morgul
card.text: Unique. Playable on The Witch-king or Akhôrahil the Ringwraith, if he is a Warlord and at Minas Morgul. Your avatar may tap to bring this card into play from your sideboard. During the organization phase at Minas Morgul, he may tap to take Forced March or a command card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Spies into Mordor
card.text: Quest. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company. Bring Mordor in Ruins into play from your sideboard (if possible); minion players may bring Foundations Remain into play from their sideboard. When you play a Stolen Knowledge card with a company at a site in Mordor, store it and rotate this card it 90°. Flip this card when fully rotated. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Strange as News from Bree
card.text: Quest. Playable only as a starting event or in lieu of playing a minor item with a starting company. Any opponent may bring Strange as News from Bree into play from his sideboard. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Discard a Stolen Knowledge card from play to force opponent to reveal his hand; if he has a character in hand, he must discard it or you may shuffle one hazard from your sideboard into your play deck (opponent€™'s choice); then you may flip this card.

card.name: There's Queer Folk About
card.text: Twice per turn you may place a stored Stolen Knowledge card with this card (it is still considered stored) and rotate this card 90°; rotate any other version of There'€™s Queer Folk About backwards 90°. If this card is fully rotated, it gives 3 mp.

card.name: Use with Terrible Effect
card.text: Rotate 90° when you successfully play a Dragon faction having modified the influence attempt by discarding an item. This card gives 1 mp for each time rotated. Additionally: if rotated 90°, you may play one hazard event in response to an opponent€™s company facing an attack created by your Dragon faction; if rotated 180°, you may play Long Grievous Siege on your Dragon factions; if rotated 270°, your Fever of Unrest require one fewer Wilderness [w] to play a Dragon hazard creature (or two fewer if fully rotated).

card.name: Watch over Mordor
card.text: Remove Mordor in Ruins from the game. You may play Tower Raided at any Dark-hold [D] in Mordor (as if at a Shadow-hold [S]). Invert this card when you successfully play Tower Raided on a site in Mordor. If inverted, this card gives 4 mp. Only one copy of this card can be inverted. Re-invert this card if you do not have Tower Raided on a site in Mordor.

card.name: Wholesome Forest
card.text: Attacks against minion and overt companies keyed to a region or site in Mirkwood receive +1 prowess and strikes for every two unique hero factions in play at such sites. When this card is inverted, it gives 3 mp (even to an Elf-lord) and any Land of the Necromancer is re-inverted. Flip this card when it is re-inverted. Wizard or Elf-lord only: invert this card when you store Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur or if Towers Destroyed is fully rotated.
